name: Wren
dialogue: Well, well, look who we have here... you are a decadent treat for thessse eyesss.

dialogue.message: I am now that you are here. You are too kind.
response: I try to be honest when I can, and go on a healthy dossse of vacationsss, too.
Ssspeaking of, have you gone anywhere exciting recently?
Oh honey, I couldn't. I'm on a no sugar diet to get in shape for my next vacation.
Give me sssome insspo- have you gone anywhere exciting recently?
You're a ssshy one. Don't worry about it.
You need to relax. Have you gone on a vacation recently?

message: You might be surprised, but I'm actually visssiting on vacay right now.
Had a night free and wanted some drinks and fun.
I went to the waterpark lassst weekend. Doesss that count?
Hmm, maybe I ssshould plan sssomething bigger sssoon.

dialogue.message: No. Travelling is ssscary. I'm happy here. Thisss isss a big city.

dialogue: You're a hoot, darling. I'm here working on set for the next "Sssnakes on a Cruissse" movie.
It'sss a sssmall role, but enough to pay for my trip to the issslandsss. I can't wait to be free again.
[player]I knew you looked familiar! I love that ssseriesss. Can I...?

message: ...get a picture with you to ssshow my friendsss?
We were just quoting "Sssnakes on a Train".

dialogue.message: ...be excused. I have to go to the bathroom.

dialogue: [announcer][buzzer]Okay Sssnakesss! Move to Sssnake Number four!!
Oh ssshoot! Looks like we are out of time. Next time darling. This has been a pleasure.

message: It ssso hasss. Until next time. Ciao!
[quiet]You kiss the air platonically as Wren leaves.

dialogue.message: *You wave ecstatically to Wren as they leave.*

message: [quiet]...accidently dripping venom from your fangs as Wren leaves.

epilogue: Oh honey, you are sssuch a doll. I'd love to sssnuggle up with you asss we explore the world.
Are you feeling what I'm feeling, hun?
[quiet]Wren quickly brings you to a blush, but after a moment or two, you regain your composure.
[player]I... I think we can make that happen. I'm ready for another adventure!
[name]? You are ssspeaking my language. Let'sss get this ssshow on the road...
